TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewHeaderRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

summary.span: 表示定义列标题的行布局所用的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这对象和对象都是用于支持对象列中显示数据的模式。This object and objects are support objects for the mode that displays data in columns for a . 有关如何定义详细信息视图中，请参阅[GridView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md)。For more information about how to define a view, see the [GridView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md). 您可以确定当列移动到新位置通过监视为定义的事件。You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the event that is defined for the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先顺序的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于列标题的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use for the column headers.
The to use for the column header container.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实现此类作为的一部分视图模式下，此属性的值绑定到的值属性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先顺序的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 当您设置样式时，将一些限制。When you set styles, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或属性设置，则将忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置多个属性，将使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式的列标题。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示可用于设置列标题，按从最低到最高优先级的顺序排列的格式的属性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实现此类作为的一部分视图模式下，此属性的值绑定到的值属性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 如果属性和都设置了属性，优先。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先顺序的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.

summary.span: 获取或设置提供逻辑来选择用于显示列标题的数据模板的 。

value.span: ，选择用于显示每个列标题的 。

span.span: The that chooses the to use to display each column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性和都设置了属性，优先。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 当实现此类作为的一部分视图模式下，此属性的值绑定到的值属性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先顺序的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个类派生自实现实用的重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识选择器实现所请求的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该密钥是指派生类实现在实际的重写。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 你可以以编程方式添加的实例在作为资源的资源字典的类。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实现此类作为的一部分视图模式下，此属性的值绑定到的值属性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先顺序的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `toolTipContent` 将成为显示的文本的字符串。A string that becomes the display text for the . `toolTipObjectContent` 要用作工具提示内容的对象。An object to use as the content for the tooltip. 通常情况下，此对象是或某些其他元素，该元素定义的布局，如文本元素。Typically, this object is a or some other element that defines a layout for the , such as a text element. 在此使用情况元素是隐式创建从已分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，并`toolTipObjectContent`内容设置为其属性。In this usage, a element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 请参阅 。See . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于 的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件发生时列移动到新位置时，移动被取消。If a event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled. 此实现不会处理事件。This implementation does not handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户在 内按下鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，此方法会准备一个列拖动到列标题行中的其他位置。If is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row. 此实现处理通过设置事件事件自变量到`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户释放鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，并且如果事件发生在列拖动到新位置之后，移动列。If is `true`, and if the event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved. 此实现处理通过设置事件事件自变量到`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseMove (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户移动鼠标时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`并且用户按下鼠标左键，此方法实现发生在用户拖动时的可视行为到新位置。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a to a new location. 此方法重写集为事件自变量`true`为即使用户没有按下鼠标左键的事件。This method override sets the event argument to `true` for the event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
